entries.d4ce13213769: The missing <span0>WHY</span0><br0></br0> behind your pull requests.
entries.af173d5936e4: GitHub tracks code changes. WhyStack preserves the reasoning behind them. Transform pull requests from temporary discussions into permanent architectural decisions.
entries.967bb1945a47: The problem isn’t code.<br0></br0>It’s lost context.
entries.de4e1a2943f1: Every day, engineering teams make critical architectural decisions inside Pull Requests. Once the PR is merged, that context is buried.
entries.a08f628813d5: WhyStack turns pull requests<br0></br0>into decision memory.
entries.3564649531f9: We attach a structured "Why" document to every PR, enforcing documentation before merge. It creates a searchable brain for your codebase.
entries.12e302af44dc: No marketing fluff. Just your projects and their decisions.
entries.9a5b047105b0: Redis was causing data persistence issues during high-load restarts. Moving to Postgres ensures ACID compliance for user sessions while maintaining acceptable latency.
entries.7754289980de: Why not just use PR descriptions?
entries.b62f99fe6bd9: They are designed to be merged and forgotten. Searching closed PRs is a friction-heavy process.
entries.9cfe3de94f03: External documentation (Notion/Confluence) drifts away from the actual code implementation.
entries.34d4fe1e4bbc: Decisions are tightly coupled to the specific code change event, preserving exact context forever.
entries.7f8a93c86931: WhyStack is built by developers for developers. We don't lock you in. Export your decision data to JSON/Markdown at any time.
entries.b9bd508a8f77: Never lose the <span0>WHY</span0><br0></br0>behind your code again.
entries.239a2fcf609f: Select a GitHub repository to track decisions
entries.4d06b384651d: Document the "why" behind your pull requests. Never lose context in Slack threads again.
entries.38ebf3c3fc30: WhyStack watches pull requests to capture decisions.
entries.a2101244e098: This document serves as the single source of truth for this architectural change. Record the context, decisions, and tradeoffs to ensure long-term maintainability.
entries.3f07588d947c: Explain the motivation, context, and why this is the right move...
entries.b6b26bfd6e2c: What are the downsides? What alternatives were rejected?
entries.fabeffa16984: Choose a PR from the sidebar to view or document its decision.
